---
title: "Mostly Monte Carlo Seminar Series"
---

A monthly seminar on the theory and practice of Monte Carlo in statistics and data science.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Held on the **2nd Friday of each month** (approximately) at the **PariSanté Campus**.

Organised by Timothy Johnston and [Antoine Luciano](https://sites.google.com/view/aluciano), and formerly organised by Andrea Bertazzi and [Joshua Bon](https://bonstats.github.io).
